response.overview: Ray and Ken, two hit men, are in Bruges, Belgium, waiting for their next mission. While they are there they have time to think and discuss their previous assignment. When the mission is revealed to Ken, it is not what he expected.
response.title: In Bruges

titles.title: ヒットマンズ・レクイエム

results.name: Ken Is Ordered To Take Out Ray
Colin Farrell & Brendan Gleeson on In Bruges | Film4 Interview Special
